mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.cust_id, c.product_id, c.product_qt, c.cart_regdate, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_img FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY c.cart_regdate DESC

SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.cust_id AS custId, c.product_id AS productId, c.product_qt AS productQt, c.cart_regdate AS cartRegdate, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_price AS productPrice, p.product_img AS productImg FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.cust_id = #{custId} ORDER BY c.cart_regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cust_id, product_id, product_qt, cart_regdate) VALUES (#{custId}, #{productId}, #{productQt}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_qt = product_qt + #{productQt}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE cust_id = #{custId} AND product_id = #{productId}
